bibl.title: On the Poetics of Dioscoros of Aphrodito: The Encomium on Duke Kallinikos (P. Cair. Masp. III 67315).
bibl.note: P. Cairo Masp. III, 67315 verso (= M.-P.3 348.14; LDAB 6254). Brief exploration of what can be identified as 'Christian' and 'pagan' influences on the poetry of Dioscoros of Aphrodito.

bibl.title: Shifting Cultural Frontiers in Late Antiquity.

bibl.seg: Raymond L. Capra, On the Poetics of Dioscoros of Aphrodito: The Encomium on Duke Kallinikos (P. Cair. Masp. III 67315).
David Brakke, Deborah M. Deliyannis & Edward Watts (edd.), Shifting Cultural Frontiers in Late Antiquity (Farnham - Burlington, VT, 2012) pp. 129-138.
P. Cairo Masp. III, 67315 verso (= M.-P.3 348.14; LDAB 6254). Brief exploration of what can be identified as 'Christian' and 'pagan' influences on the poetry of Dioscoros of Aphrodito.
